ProductInfo.Features:
SVAT CV301-8CH-008 8 Channel H.264 Smart DVR Security System with Coaching iMenu and 8 Indoor/Outdoor Hi-Res CCD Night Vision Surveillance Cameras
Record over a month of footage with H.264 Compression
Let the coaching iMenu teach you about the DVRs different settings and features
View video online with no service fees from any computer in the world
Compatible with Windows Mobile, Symbian operating systems and iPhones
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT CV301-8CH-008 Web Ready 8 Channel H.264 500GB HDD DVR Security System with 8 Indoor/Outdoor Hi-Res Night Vision CCD Surveillance Cameras and Smart Phone Access
